games.title: Puppetman: Ragdoll Puzzle
games.description: Dive into the thrilling world of Puppetman: Ragdoll Puzzle, an engaging game that tests your cleverness and quick reactions. Navigate Poly through challenging levels with clever tactics to avoid crashes. With 15 progressively difficult stages, it offers an exciting challenge, whether on mobile or desktop.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard: Control is carried out by pressing  keys A, S, D .
Mobile: Control is carried out by pressing buttons on the screen.

games.title: Stack the Blocks
games.description: Dive into the captivating world of Stack the Blocks, a strategic online puzzle game on a 10x10 grid. Challenge your logic by placing blocks to clear lines and earn points. Accessible yet complex, it guarantees addictive entertainment on both mobile and desktop platforms.
games.howToPlayText: The 10×10 game board is your canvas for creativity and strategy. Place the offered blocks to form solid horizontal or vertical lines. Once a line is complete, it disappears, making room for new pieces.

games.title: Help Tricky Story A Complicated Story
games.description: Dive into the captivating world of Help Tricky Story, a unique online game that tests your problem-solving abilities through complex puzzles. Available for free on mobile or desktop, this engaging adventure encourages logical thinking as you face delightful challenges to sharpen your mind.
games.howToPlayText:
Help Tricky Story A Complicated Story - a fun logic game, a puzzle game with fun challenges. Connect, destroy, compose and pull out various puzzles in fascinating scenarios. Pump up your thinking, pump up your brain.
Об игре
Help Tricky Story A Complicated Story a new breath of all intellectual games, a kind of test for the brain with original scenarios taking place in everyday life. It will take out your brain, and you will become a master of riddles.
This fun game is the best combination of brain puzzles. You can enjoy these mind games, decision making tasks with fun puzzles.
Try this incredible mind-blowing brain game, solve challenging puzzles, find a solution and complete each level in these mind-testing games.
Will you be able to find an impossible solution and help the characters.

- Apply real logic to cope with difficulties.
- Various puzzles
- Increase your free thinking
- Think outside the box
- Find solutions to riddles
- Simple and addictive gameplay

Control various items in order to solve logic quests. The final goal is indicated by a green dotted line.

games.title: Climb Up!
games.description: In this challenging adventure, you''ll embark on a perilous ascent up a massive, treacherous mountain. Navigate slippery surfaces and unpredictable obstacles as you make your way towards the summit, where eternal glory and a rewarding gift await. Will you be able to overcome the many hurdles and reach the top, or will the climb prove too daunting? Your determination and skill will be tested as you brave the unknowns of this grueling climb.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag joysticks to move your right and left hands

Climb higher, but avoid slippy surfaces

games.title: Darts Pro
games.description: Step up to the oche with Darts Pro, the ultimate online precision game that challenges your aim and skills. Immerse yourself in the world of darts, where the rules are inspired by the official Darts Regulation Authority. Whether you're on your phone or computer, this game offers a free and thrilling experience. Aim with your mouse or touch screen, and strive to hit that elusive bullseye. Keep an eye out for bonus symbols that can significantly boost your score. Simple to play, yet difficult to master, Darts Pro will test the limits of your dexterity and precision.
games.howToPlayText: Playing Darts Pro is easy to understand. Use your mouse or touch screen to target your dart, then click or tap to throw. Your goal is to land as close to the center of the target as you can. However, be mindful of bonus symbols that can boost your points.

games.title: Ball: Path Through Obstacles
games.description: Roll through an obstacle course playing as a ball. Avoid traps and collect coins to unlock new skins
games.howToPlayText:
The game controls depend on the device you are playing on.

On PC:
Use the WASD keys to control the ball.

W (up) — moving forward.
A (left) — turn left.
S (down) is a backward movement.
D (right) — turn to the right.
The space bar is a jump.
To use the improvements, click on the improvement icon on the left side of the screen.
To buy a skin, click on the store icon in the menu.

On a smartphone/tablet:
On touch devices, control is performed using a virtual joystick located in the lower left part of the screen. Move your finger across the screen to control the movement of the ball.
To jump, click on the button in the lower right part of the screen.
To use the improvements, click on the improvement icon on the left side of the screen.
To buy a skin, click on the store icon in the menu.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/ball-path-through-obstacles?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Pocket ZONE
games.description:
See the Chernobyl nuclear power plant and realize your innermost dream with the help of the legendary Performer of desires.
Or maybe you just want to get away from the gray and boring life of megacities and just wander through the deserts of the earth, where a person is again left alone with an aggressive environment that dreams of absorbing him?

Features of the game:
☢ Hardcore real mobile survival system with the best RPG component, inspired by the Fallout and Stalker series.
☢ Interesting random text events, the outcome of which depends only on your choice and on external factors that directly affect your chances of survival.
☢ A complex and well-thought-out mining system, and more than a hundred random events in the search and confrontation with the aggressive environment of the anomalous world of the Zone.
☢ More than 100 different types of weapons, armor, helmets, backpacks and costumes, including legendary and mythical items!
games.howToPlayText:
PC control: Left mouse click to interact with game elements. Мouse wheel to scroll lists.
Management on a mobile device: Touch to interact with game elements.
